'''Blueprints''' or '''Furnishing (Set) Blueprints''' are similar to [[recipe]]s, [[diagram]]s or [[instructions]], but are used for [[furnishing]]s or [[Furnishing Sets|furnishing sets]]. Once used, the player will be able to create the associated furnishing.

Blueprints can primarily be purchased from [[Tubby]] using [[Realm Currency]]. They can also be acquired through other means, such as leveling [[Trust Rank]], completing the [[Serenitea Pot/Adeptal Mirror|Adeptal Mirror]], chests, vendors in the open world, events, and the [[Battle Pass]].
